channel.title: Algorithm on AesVoy
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithm on AesVoy

item.title: PageRank
item.description: PageRank, created by Google founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin, changed the web by ranking pages based on the quality and quantity of their links, rather than just keywords. It evaluates a page’s authority through its endorsements, improving the relevance and trustworthiness of search results.

item.title: Weighted Voronoi Stippling
item.description: Stippling, a timeless artistic technique, traces its origins back through the annals of art history, where it emerged as a method of creating texture, depth, and form through the precise placement of dots.

item.title: Voronoi Diagram
item.description: Voronoi diagrams, also known as Dirichlet tessellation or Thiessen polygons, are everywhere in nature. You’ve likely encountered them thousands of times, but perhaps didn’t know what they were called.

item.title: Difference of Gaussians(DoG) Algorithm
item.description: The Difference of Gaussians (DoG) algorithm is a technique in image processing used for edge detection and feature enhancement.
